pages.page: I.3. Salaries are regularly and promptly paid.

Republic of the Philippines CAVITE STATE UNIVERSITY Don Severino de las Alas Campus Indang, Cavite www.cvsu.edu.ph
HUMAN RESOURCE DEVELOPMENT OFFICE
OFFICE MEMORANDUM NO. 22, s. 2022
TO : ALL COLLEGE DEANS AND CAMPUS ADMINISTRATORS
FROM : FLORINDO C. ILAGAN, Ph.D. Director
SUBJECT : SUBMISSION OF FINAL LIST OF COS FACULTY FOR FIRST SEMESTER, AY 2022-2023
DATE : SEPTEMBER 2, 2022
1. Please submit to this office the list of your contract of service faculty with approved recommendation using the attached template not later than September 6, 2022.
2. This is to facilitate the processing of their contract for the first semester of AY 2022- 2023.
3. Attached also is the corresponding rate per hour based on the BOR-approved hourly rates for contract of service undergraduate faculty for your guidance
4. For strict compliance.
5. Thank you.
(046) 419-4527 / 09497721045 email: cvsuhrd@cvsu.edu.ph
